description:

Fortunately, not only is the long-awaited sequel happening, but we’re also getting a new trilogy out of the deal. Now director Danny [...]

title: ’28 Years Later’ Trilogy To Be “Wholly Different” Says Director

description:
The Gremlins film franchise has held a place in pop culture since the original film was released in 1984. Unlike many other popular films of the era, however, it was only followed by a single sequel in 1990. The film, titled Gremlins 2: The New Batch, ended up performing less successfully than its predecessor and [...]

title: New ‘Gremlins’ Movie Reportedly In The Works

description:

In the time since, the free-to-play title has grown in popularity, with availability and cross-play across all platforms like PlayStation 5, Windows, and Xbox Series X/S.
